f.1.q: 01. Why Do I Need To Invest With Timo Stephan Investment?
f.1.a: Timo Stephan Investment Services to a Million goal stands for excellence, entrepreneurship and professionalism. Via Foreign Exchange markets, we specialize in producing passive returns for our  members and pushing creative ideas through further diversification.
f.2.q: 02. Who Is Permitted To Join Our Platform?
f.2.a: Customers must, as a rule of thumb, be 18 or older to trade or invest in either of our plans. Our regulatory body mandates that no clients under the age of 18 are authorized to open an account and this is strictly enforced by us.
f.3.q: 03. Can I Create More Than One Account?
f.3.a: Trading or investment account duplication is recorded as it is against our law to own multiple accounts, instead of making multiple investment plans on the same account.
f.4.q: 04. When Can I Withdraw My Earnings?
f.4.a: As stated in your investment plan, this depends on the duration. Each package is special and has a time limit for benefit access listed.
f.5.q: 05. How Long Does It Take To Receive My Earnings?
f.5.a: On completion of the withdrawal process, with the wallet address of your choosing, your money will be sent to you within 24 hours. Effective and assured withdrawals are given by Timo Stephan Investment.
f.6.q: 06. What is the possibility that i will earn?
f.6.a: There is always a percentage chance of losing money, but here you are investing with an asset management firm and we guarantee capital protection on all invested funds. This means that the amount paid at the moment of trade is protected by insurance if trading goes south. We have a one million dollar Employee Negligence cover as well.
f.7.q: 07. How Do I Invest/Upgrade A Plan?
f.7.a: You have the option to withdraw all your assets, including profits made, or retain the funds and  withdraw the profits, after the time of trading an accumulated interest on your account. If your earnings are appropriate for a package that you want to upgrade or you want to opt for compounding, inform us by email so that you can determine when to upgrade.
